title: Meetings, bloody meetings (NP)
brief_description: Demonstrates the disciplines and management techniques that can be used to make meetings shorter and more productive. Intended for all levels of management. Features John Cleese as the Chairman with Timothy West and Angela Down. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
